t.x: The most commonly used verb. To do an action. Combines with nouns to form verbs.
e: I to do.
I to do every day.
to doing is an important activity.
Understanding various contexts of to doing enriches expression.

e: I to go.
I to go every day.
to going is an important activity.
Understanding various contexts of to going enriches expression.
